document_data.name: Claw of the Wyrm Rune
document_data.mainbody: The '''''claw of the wyrm rune''''' was a rare magical [[dragon]]'s claw that had been coated with molten [[silver]] and inscribed with the [[Giant language|giant]] rune ''wyrm''.
document_data.Powers:
Three times a day, wielders of this claw could point it at any dragon within {{SI|20|ft|long=yes}} of them and those of weak will would be rendered temporarily vulnerable to all forms of damage. The claw also granted its bearers a resistance to the breath weapon of any dragon.

Additionally, the wielder could permanently affix the claw's magic to an area by drawing a ''wyrm'' rune in the desired location. The process was lengthy, taking up to eight hours, and required the claw to be within {{SI|5|ft|long=yes}} of the rune. Once complete, the claw would be shattered beyond repair and any dragons that wandered within {{SI|100|ft|long=yes}} of the rune would feel a heavy weight forcing them to fly no higher than {{SI|10|ft|long=yes}}.
